properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 110259Z AUG
   BY M/V SANCO STAR AND M/V OCEAN EUROPE TOWING
   300 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-24.00S 040-06.25W, 22-28.20S 039-58.88W,
   22-31.75S 040-01.50W, 22-27.33S 040-08.63W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1714/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 110359Z AUG 12.
